column1: Have had ricesea for years and never took care of it. It has gotten worse over the years and this was the first product I tried. It feels amazing not greasy and could tell a difference after two days!!
I have sensitive skin so face moisturizers are always hit or miss but this one seems to work good! Does help with redness as well. Skin looks
Awesome product. Does helps a lot with redness. I definitely like what I see only three days later
